message: Hello Bob, thank you for your interest. I’m offering my exclusive product at $2500000. I believe this price accurately reflects its premium quality and unique value. I’m confident you’ll see the benefit of this opportunity. I look forward to your response.

Alice, thank you for the offer, but $2500000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm interested in your product, but I can only offer $1000000 at this time. This represents a fair price considering the value I place on the product. Please let me know your thoughts.
